EmailTemplate.description: This email is sent to each insurer twice a day (12am, 12pm) with the number of cases that have been allocated but not yet been downloaded by the insurer. (showing new and updated cases)
EmailTemplate.name: OLCNInsurerDigestEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Today()} Online CTP submissions for download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name} team,
You have {!Account.OLCN_InsurerProcessStatusNewCount__c} new CTP submission(s) to download.
You have {!Account.OLCN_InsurerProcessStatusUpdateCount__c} updated CTP submission(s) to download.
Login here to view the list: [Link to the portal list view page 'All Open cases']
Kind regards
Claims Advisory Service
State Insurance Regulatory Authority
p 1300 656 919
www.sira.nsw.gov.au
